text_elements.text:
Summary & Future Work
Enabling Practical AI Deployment

Key Contributions
Adaptive Query-Routing
Intelligent per-query selection between DA, CoT, and RAG paths.

Learning-to-Route Strategy
Iterative prompt refinement from heuristics to profile-based classification.

Performance Achievements
Achieved 85%+ accuracy with under 50% energy consumption of baseline.

Community Artifacts
Full reproducibility package with templates and analysis.

Multi-Model Ensemble Routing
Extend framework to route between multiple specialized models.

Real-Time Adaptation
Implement online learning for continuous routing optimization.

Ultra-Low Resource Deployment
Investigate using a compact model for routing, reserving the primary, larger model for generating the response.

Broader Impact
Democratizes AI deployment for SMEs
Enables privacy-compliant on-premises solutions Reduces environmental footprint of AI systems



Intelligent system design can make advanced AI accessible, efficient, and practical for resource-constrained environments.
A pathway toward democratized, sustainable AI deployment
Adaptive Query-Routing Framework for Optimizing Small Language Models
